html:
DEAL: Now’s a Good Time to Buy Galaxy Z Flip 6 Cases, They’re 40% Off

December 10, 2024

We may earn a commission when you click links to retailers and purchase goods. More info.

Discover Samsung deals are active this week, with the mobile-related highlight for day being 40% off Galaxy Z Flip 6 cases. At that pricing, you can get a case for as low as $24, which isn’t bad considering they retail for $40.

Even the very nice Kindsuit cases are on sale, priced at $59. Compared to the $99 they usually are, that’s not bad at all. There are three options to choose from: Kindsuit, Silicone, and Clear. They’re all on sale, so if you don’t have any protection for your fancy foldable, follow the links below.

Anyone here opting to run their Flip naked? Some folks like to live dangerously.

Samsung Links: Kindsuit Case | Silicone Case | Clear Case
